title: Why is some jackass deleting every post I make?
body:
Is it because I'm from EUW? It's not my fault that you're from OCE (the most unskilled region in the world) so stop taking out your frustration on me. Is this supposed to be the thanks I get after everything I've done to improve the OCE community? I mean I get that I'm a bigger asset to the community than the moderators, but you don't have to be jealous and try to silence me because of that, we can work together.

Hatin' ain't good for your health you know.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EVsdXnAMeJM
